repairedDockerfile:
FROM phusion/baseimage:0.9.15 
MAINTAINER Piotr Szotkowski <chastell@chastell.net> 

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive 
ENV HOME /root 

CMD ["/sbin/my_init"] 

ADD files / 

RUN set -eux ; \
apt-get update ; \
apt-get --assume-yes dist-upgrade ; \
apt-get --assume-yes -y --no-install-recommends install lsb-core software-properties-common; rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; \
apt-get autoremove ; \
apt-get clean ; \
rm -fr /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
